short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Remove inactive and deactivated friends from FB

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Evaluate engagement of your Friends and be able to easily remove people who are not engaging with your posts. You can also whitelist ones you never want to accidently delete.
